There are $52$ people in a room. What is the largest value of $n$ such that the statement "At least $n$ people in this room have birthdays falling in the same month" is always true?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  2 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\  3 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 4  \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\  5 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  12 $
